entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
